EmailTemplate.description: Acknowledgement email that is sent to SAM/AM to confirm that we have received application
EmailTemplate.name: 1. Associate Mentor Application Received
EmailTemplate.subject: TCS: Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks very much for applying to be an {!Job_Application__c.Roles__c} with The Challenge.
This is to confirm that we have received your application.
We will contact all applicants by the beginning of May 2014. If your application is successful, you will need to attend a day of training with us. Details of training will be emailed to successful candidates.
In the meantime, if you have any questions please email grads@the-challenge.org
Thanks again,
The Challenge Society
